description: Publisher which pulls data from ODBC compliant data sources

ConnectionString.title: Connection String
ConnectionString.description: The ODBC Connection string with (Optional) PASSWORD in place for your connection secret.

Password.title: Password
Password.description: (Optional) The secret of your connection string. Will replace PASSWORD in the connection string.

PrePublishQuery.title: Pre-Publish Query
PrePublishQuery.description: (Optional) Query to be run before a read begins.

PostPublishQuery.title: Post-Publish Query
PostPublishQuery.description: (Optional) Query to be run after a read completes.
